title: Aluth Avurudu Sirith at Medamulana
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana) When the whole country celebrates Sinhala and Tamil New Year in a peaceful environment after eliminating three decades of terrorism, President Mahinda Rajapaksa also observed the “Sinhala Aluth Avurudu Sirith” at Carlton House in Medamulana, Weerakatiya.
